dbxrefs.title: External Resources
dbxrefs.description: Identifiers from external resources that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with IGVF donors.
dbxrefs.comment: This property is overwritten by the subclasses to define specific enum values.

items.title: External Identifier
items.description: Identifier from an external resource that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with IGVF donors.

phenotypic_features.title: Phenotypic Features
phenotypic_features.description: A list of associated phenotypic features of the donor.

virtual.title: Virtual
virtual.description: Virtual donors are not representing actual human or model organism donors, samples coming from which were used in experiments, but rather capturing metadata about hypothetical donors that the reported analysis results are relevant for.
virtual.comment: For example, a prediction of a certain TF's binding profile in mice should not be associated with actual mouse donor, but with a virtual donor, making it clear that the reported predicted binding profile is not associated with actual samples coming from a specific mouse strain.

supersedes.title: Supersedes
supersedes.description: The donor(s) that this donor supersedes by virtue of being newer, better, or a fixed version of etc. than the one(s) it supersedes.
supersedes.comment: The linked donor(s) are expected to have a revoked or archived status.

items.title: Superseded Donor
items.description: Donor that this donor supersedes by virtue of being newer, better, or a fixed version of etc. than the one it supersedes.
